resources.string: Heroica is a LEGO Games subtheme that was released in June of 2011. It was originally spotted at a 2011 Toy Fair. It is an adventuring game with models that can be purchased separately from each other, of which there are five. The modules can be arranged as suggested in the instructions, or at the discretion of the player. You can play in Normal Mode, Epic Mode, and Battle Mode.\n Microfigures Introduced\n The Microfigures introduced in this theme include two factions, the Heroes and the Monsters. Each set contains a few heroes and numerous monsters for the heroes to fight. Some microfigures are exclusive to certain sets, but some, such as the Wizard and the Barbarian, appear in multiple sets.
